cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: son born of a concubine, disaster, sin, evil

exm.mng: unfilial son, unworthy son, illegitimate son, concubine's son
to do evil, to commit sins
remaining evil element, surviving members (of evil former regime), dregs (of colonial administration)
bane of one's existence, vile spawn
Flower in the sea of evil, late Qing novel by Jin Tianhe 金天翮[Jin1 Tian1 he2]
sin (in Buddhism), enmity leading to sin
